name: Mihirha's Legacy
description:
Discover more about the Ark starship and help the passengers to reach their promised destination.

Mihirha's Legacy is a story focused game in which you solve arcade puzzles to progress on the adventure.

General Information:
There is just one Level of difficulty.
Save your game from the main menu when you need it.
Length is around 3 hours.

Additional notes:
Headphones recomended.
Keyboard recommended.
Please avoid spoilers as much as you can to get the best experience.
